record.title: RECESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate stands in recess until 3 o'clock.
Thereupon, at 2:17 p.m., the Senate recessed until 3:03 p.m. and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Ms. Klobuchar).
In my capacity as a Senator from the State of Minnesota, I suggest the absence of a quorum.
record.narrative: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
